mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post (post_title, post_content, member_id, category_id) values (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{memberId}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select m.member_name, c.category_name, p.category_id, p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_read_count, p.post_status, p.member_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id join tbl_category c on p.category_id = c.id where p.id = #{id} and p.post_status = 'active'

select m.member_name, c.category_name, p.category_id, p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_read_count, p.post_status, p.member_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id join tbl_category c on p.category_id = c.id where p.post_status = 'active' order by p.created_date desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_post WHERE post_status = 'active'
mapper.update: update tbl_post set post_title = #{postTitle}, post_content = #{postContent}, category_id = #{categoryId}, updated_date = NOW() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, post_title, post_content, post_read_count, post_status, member_id, category_id, created_date, updated_date from tbl_post where post_status = 'active' order by post_read_count desc limit 6

select p.post_title, p.post_content, p.created_date from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id where p.post_status = 'active' and (m.member_email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.member_Name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) order by p.created_date desc
